pathAssistantSteps.info:
Rep Actions Taken During Stage:

  • Develop negotiation strategy with leadership
  • Finalize agreement and deal terms internally
  • Get new account information filled out
  • Finalize agreement and deal terms with customer
  • Confirm sequence of events to close

Exit Criteria:

  • Questions concerning contract are addressed

Rep Actions Taken During Stage:

  • Confirm decision makers are all engaged
  • Partner with Pre-sales team to scope customer solution
  • Determine customer decision criteria
  • Validate Recommendation through an in-depth Demo with SC's
  • Confirm next steps

Exit Criteria:

  • Buyer confirms that we have the product and services needed
  • Buyer requests quote for the product

Rep Actions Taken During Stage:

  • Document needs and expectations
  • Answer the question: What is client pain and what does client hope to gain from solving it?
  • Identify Decision Making Process including Economic buyer
  • Possibly cooking demo in 2nd or 3rd Discovery call

Exit Criteria:

  • Buyer confirms the problem is worth addressing and identifies timeline/approval process
  • Buyer request Demo
  • The buyer is 'price qualified

Rep Actions Taken During Stage:

  • Provide detailed pricing in a meeting
  • Affirm value of CallRevu vs. competition
  • Share customer story or facilitate introduction with a current customer (if available)
  • Share paper (initiate paper process)

Exit Criteria:

  • Buyer confirms their intention to buy
  • Buyer request Contract

Rep Actions Taken During Stage:

  • Conduct a qualification call to validate existing CPQ process (or need specific to your product)
  • Identify potential key decision makers; ex. Who will be the detractor/who is the champion?

Exit Criteria

  • Buyer has been identified
  • Buyer has expressed interest in our solutions
  • Buyer agrees to a meeting/call

Rep Actions Taken During Stage:

  • Submit contract to SOPs for review

Exit Criteria:

  • Proposal submitted for review to SOPs
